alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 9:57AM CDT until May 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting Woodruff and White Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Monroe and Arkansas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Farm ground along the river in White and Woodruff counties begin to flood. Seasonal agricultural impacts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to fall below flood stage Monday afternoon, May 8th. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 AM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 26.6 Fri 9 AM 26.5 26.3 26.0 FALLING &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
